name: Dispel Synergy
text: By tearing away an opponent’s magical defenses, you leave your enemy vulnerable, making it difficult for him to resist your spells.
benefit: If you successfully dispel an ongoing magical effect on an opponent, that opponent takes a –2 penalty on saving throws against your spells until the end of your next turn.
text_zh: 你撕裂了对手的魔法防御，同时让他陷入虚弱，更加难以抵抗你的法术。
benefit_zh: 如果你成功的解除了一个敌人身上的魔法效果，该敌人在你下一轮行动结束前，对你的法术的豁免检定都会有-2罚值。
